title: Liquitex Basics Acrylic Paint Set - 48 Colors
description: The Liquitex Basics Acrylic Paint Set includes 48 vibrant colors perfect for students, hobbyists, and artists. Each tube is made with high-quality pigments that deliver intense, long-lasting color. The smooth, thick consistency of these acrylics makes them easy to work with on various surfaces such as canvas, paper, and wood. The set comes in a sturdy, reusable box that keeps your paints organized and protected. Liquitex is known for its innovative products and commitment to quality, making this acrylic paint set an excellent choice for exploring the world of acrylic painting.
key_features: Suitable for Canvas, Paper, and Wood
Ideal for Students, Hobbyists, and Artists
